WorkflowInfo.Name: Users termination procedure
WorkflowInfo.Description: Delete users accounts according to list and deleted user profile folder.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ZipCompress;Assembly=ZipCompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:DeleteFolder;Assembly=DeleteFolder, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ADDeleteAccount;Assembly=ADDeleteAccount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable2" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="UserDetails" RowNumber="3" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="UserName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="DesktopName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>John</UserName>
 <DesktopName>JohnS12</DesktopName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>Dexter</UserName>
 <DesktopName>DexterM4</DesktopName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>Bill</UserName>
 <DesktopName>BillC77</DesktopName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="TotalUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="UserDetails" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="DesktopName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:ZipCompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="BackupServer" HostName="%DesktopName%" DisplayName="Zip Compression" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" x:Name="ZipUserProfile" TypeName="ZipCompress" DstPath="D:\DeletedUserProfiles\%UserName%.zip" SrcHostName="%DesktopName%" EncryptionType="Standard" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="C:\Documents and Settings\%UserName%" ArchivePassword="123456" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a Zip Compressed file with the specified compression type." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="1" ZipCompressionLevel="Super Fast" SrcUserName="" /> <ns5:DeleteFolder IsValid="True" x:Name="DeleteProfie" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete Folder" Path="C:\Documents and Settings\%UserName%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected folder." HostId="1" TypeName="DeleteFolder" UserName="" /> <ns6:ADDeleteAccount IsValid="True" x:Name="DeleteUser" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-Server" DisplayName="AD Delete Account" Path="DC=Ayehu,DC=COM" Description="Active directory delete account." Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" AccountType="User" HostId="-2" TypeName="ADDeleteAccount" UserName="" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process uses an Excel file or a memory table to delete obsolete users from AD and handle other activities that are related to the work termination process, such as compressing and backing up the user profile. The Excel file can be generated from your HR system and be easily used by eyeShare in this simple process, to help maintain your AD free from former employeesÂ’ users and keep your company safe.
